data.client_settings: Discord Web and Discord 0.0.175 (Build 8543) and Discord Canary 0.0.172 (Build 8596)
data.actual_result: It's greyed out so unable to use (only when server is muted).
data.expected_result: Should be able to mark category as read thus marking channels under it as read as well.
data.short_description: Unable to mark all channels under a category as read in a muted channel.
data.steps_to_repro: - Login to Discord. - Go to any server that you have muted. - Right click category, and you'll see the option "mark as read" is greyed out. - It works fine on servers not muted and requires a restart for it to kick into effect.
